fields.name: Amoxicillin
fields.description: It is used to treat bacterial infections, such as chest infections (including pneumonia) and dental abscesses.

fields.name: Betahistine
fields.description: Betahistine is a medicine used to treat the symptoms of Ménière's disease.

fields.name: Aspirin
fields.description: Aspirin is used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain from conditions such as muscle aches and headaches.

fields.name: Candesartan
fields.description: Candesartan is used alone or together with other medicines to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children 1 to 16 years of age.
